title: TrueCasino
author: TrueCasino
content: Dear all,we already posted our new project on this forum to get some feedback. We received overwhelming feedbacks and made multiple adjustments. We are welcoming developers to have a look at what we have already done. If somebody interested - very welcome.Two milestone to be resolved before getting VC pre-fundings.- Tokenomics- Fine tune our online casino (music, graphics, buttons arrangements, other services etc...)Somebody interested? Please contact us.project location: https://truecasino.org/With kind regards,True Casino team

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: If you get no response from the devs or ideal people that you need to review your project, I think you have to include what's in it for them to review.Like rewards or payments because nothing in this world is free and that's why if for a few days and still no interest gets in, that's what you need to add.

comments.author: leftover_potato
comments.body: Interested to place your casino ads on www.web3ramen.com?Let me know can't DM you thou cause your acc is newbie.
